nodes.text: "Deep Spoilers" is a short story written by Ryder Windham, with illustrations by Ole Sørensen. It was originally published in Star Wars Gamer 4 in 2001 and was made available on Hyperspace on May 26, 2006.
After the Battle of Naboo, a couple of hot headed Bongo racers get in trouble after crashing during a race. To get their licenses back, they must complete a task for Boss Nass.
